name: Abominium
description:
Welcome to abominium, a simple single screen roguelike for the 7drl challenge 2023 made with Godot by Lorenzo Di Gaetano.

(This game was made in a hurry, there are still some glitches but can be played until the end. Use the full screen button and click on screen if the game doesn't fit in your display)

Enter the cave, kill all enemies and the abominum and escape!

Monsters can see you only under a certain distance. Abominium will kill you instantly, use the arc of power!

Have fun!

All graphics by Lorenzo Di Gaetano, background music and some sounds taken from free libraries on internet.
